name: Modern Fighters
description:
Use the arrow keys to 'move'.

A -> Punch

S -> Kicks

Combine A and S in sequence to make epic Combos.

You play as a test subject 'Karrin' imprisoned by scientists inside of a simulation. To win this game you need to find all clues and all the keys in each level. 

You can unlock a secret level if you get a 'High Score' of 150.
